description:
Double the weed-killing power with more coverage

Get twice the weed-fighting power with this value 2-pack! Our fast-acting, non-selective organic formula and premium sprayer kills stubborn populations of weeds, mosses, algae, and grasses - that's right - grasses. With double the concentrate for larger areas or multiple applications, it's ideal for use in garden beds, near patios, along sidewalks, in mulched areas, and more.

Effective against bluegrass, chickweed, crabgrass, corn spurry, dandelion, groundsel, lambsquarters, mouse-eared chickweed, mustards, plantain, redroot pigweed, round leaved mallow, sheep sorrel, shepherd’s-purse, stinkweed, thistle, moss, algae, and lichens.

FEATURES

WHAT’S INCLUDED

INSTRUCTIONS

For best results, apply between 50-85 degrees F when no rain is expected for 3+ hours

sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How does weed and grass killer work?
Weed Warrior is a powerful herbicidal soap made from fatty acids, it eats away at the waxy coating that protects most green leafy growth from the elements.
Concentrates have a shelf life of ~2 years. After the initial mixing, mix well again if it sits for 30+ days.
Can I use weed and grass killer on my lawn?
Weed Warrior is non-selective, meaning it will kill any unwanted vegetation - weeds and grass. We recommend using it in gardens, sidewalks, mulch and other hardscapes rather than within your lawn.
If you use Weed Warrior within your lawn, repair bare patches with Sunday grass seed or Bare Repair.
How to use Weed Warrior with other Sunday products?
You can apply weed killer, like Weed Warrior, before or after lawn fertilizer.
Allow weed control products to dry completely before applying any other Sunday liquid products or watering your lawn–the longer the plant absorbs the weed control, the more effective the application.
When will I see results?
Fully drenched weeds will dry up in as little as 20 minutes or up to 24 hours, depending on the size and maturity of the plant you are spraying.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
